issues.description: The UML in the problem statement declares getTotalNumberOfStudents() as a public method (+getTotalNumberOfStudents(): int). The solution implementation declares this method with protected visibility (protected int getTotalNumberOfStudents()). This visibility mismatch contradicts the UML/specification and could confuse students about the expected access level and cause tests that expect a public method to fail.
issues.suggested_fix: Make the getTotalNumberOfStudents() method public to match the UML and the problem statement (change 'protected int getTotalNumberOfStudents()' to 'public int getTotalNumberOfStudents()'). Also ensure the template instructions and any tests expect the method to be public so students implement the correct visibility.
